DescribeCloudDedicatedZoneHosts.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdz.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeCloudDedicatedZoneHosts
<公共请求参数>

{
    "CloudDedicatedZoneID": "cdz-xxxxxxxx",
    "HostUuids": [
        "9e6b54d0-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx"
    ],
    "InstanceIds": [
        "ins-xxxxxxxx"
    ],
    "Offset": 1,
    "Limit": 1
}
DescribeCloudDedicatedZoneHosts.title: 查询可用区的Host和Host上部署的实例
